review: It's a great and cheaper replacement than having cable.Drawbacks; There are a few apps I wish it had (like CBS, Destination America, and ABC family) so we can watch prime time TV. It would also be nice if the prime membership offered more to watch that you did not have to pay for. $100 a year seems steep to only be able to watch a few shows for free.

review: Buffers a lot on streaming programs (no internet issues to cause this).  No Vudu app and Flixster takes forever to load if you have a large UV library.  My opinion may change over time but I would suggest looking into other set top boxes.  I will update the review if things change and I don't end up returning the Fire TV.

review: The Fire TV is great. We have used another device to stream videos to our tv and they are much more cumbersome and the streaming is often unsatisfactory. Using the Fire TV gives us the ability to select anything we want to watch, whether it's a movie or a classic television show with the ease of just using a remote to change channels.
